area: Great Orme Head to the Mull of Galloway (11)

forecast.wind: Variable mainly south 2 to 4 veering northwest 4 to 6, backing west 3 or 4 later.
forecast.sea: Smooth or slight becoming slight or moderate.
forecast.weather: Showers, with fog patches at first, fair later.
forecast.visibility: Moderate or good, occasionally very poor at first.
